Homeowner association: Fines, disable access to amenities, liens, foreclosure

Civic association: Membership fluctuates as members are free to leave or join without restitution
Neighborhood association: Membership fluctuates as members are free to leave or join without restitution

Homeowner association: Board of directors of management company handles hired services
Civic association: Board of directors seeks volunteers to help, then hires services
Neighborhood association: Board of directors seeks volunteers to help, then hires services
